attributes.action: Every leader of the main political parties should resign
attributes.background: A democratic vote was held to leave the EU.J Corbyn, T May, V Cable, N Sturgeon, A Foster have all failed to work together and reach an agreement and to carry out the wishes of the country. They all need to step down and allow new leaders to take control of their respective parties.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for these individuals and not the UK Government or Parliament.
